scripts.test: node --experimental-modules build/index.js -f ./tests/asc1.ts -o ./build/asc1.hpp && diff tests/asc1.ts.fixture.h build/asc1.hpp && clang++ -c -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Wformat=2 -Wformat-security -Werror=format-security -Wcast-align -Wcast-qual -Wconversion -Wdouble-promotion -Wfloat-equal -Wmissing-include-dirs -Wold-style-cast -Wredundant-decls -Wshadow -Wsign-conversion -Wswitch -Wuninitialized -Wunused-parameter -Walloca -Wunused-result -Wunused-local-typedefs -Wwrite-strings -Wpointer-arith -Wfloat-conversion -Wnull-dereference -Wdiv-by-zero -Wswitch-default -Wno-switch-bool -Wunknown-pragmas --target=wasm32 build/asc1.hpp && clang-tidy build/asc1.hpp
